attributes.action: Give working people help, by giving tax relief on education costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prior to 2000, working people used to be able to claim tax relief when they attended college to try and attain further professional qualifications to better themselves.
This government removed this relief and I call on them to now help working people who are struggling anyway with rising costs, to at least help them a little by allowing them to claim the tax back on the costs incurred going to college/university to achieve further professional qualifications where their employer does not contribute towards that cost.
